original_text:
I saw that wisdom is better than folly,
    just as light is better than darkness.
korean_text: 내가 보니 지혜가 우매보다 뛰어남이 빛이 어둠보다 뛰어남 같도다

sentences.original_text: I saw that wisdom is better than folly,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 지혜가 어리석음보다 낫다는 것을 보았고,

sentences.original_text: just as light is better than darkness.
